head.title: Java Document Merging API | merge & remove Word Excel PDF XPS EPUB
head.description: Documents merging API for Java. Merge, split, swap, reorder and delete pages of PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, Visio, XPS & EPUB formats.

header.description: Flexible Merger API to easily combine, split, or modify PDF and Office Documents
